author: Juan Forero
title: Ecuador Voters Block Former Presidentâ€™s Return to Power
text:
Voters in Ecuador on Sunday approved a referendum that all but blocks Rafael Correa, a former president and leftist firebrand, from returning to power.
With nearly all the votes counted, the National Electoral Council said two out of every three voters had approved a ballot initiative that limits presidents to two terms. That is a victory for its main proponent, current President Lenin Moreno, and a reversal for Mr. Correa, who feverishly campaigned against the referendum.
